compositingFiles._comment: Files related to compositing; location relative to json file. Web shares (so far) for download: sift

microCameraImages._comment: Creator identify any supporting source image forms. Paths should be relative to the location of the json file. amcdir: Aware MicroCamera images: please store in folder 'amc_images', to speed web search for tifs. Available for Web download (so far): zipFile, smallComposite, largeComposite

photographer._comment: Filled out by anyone, typically the photographer. Quality=0 means unassessed.
photographer.title: BP27

snapshot._comment: Ideally automatically set by snapshot program. snapMoment+cameraid make up unique image identifier at this time.
